# Wrangle data {.tabset .tabset-sticky}

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
source("0_helpers.R")
```

## Wrangle wrangle

```{r}
data("msleep")
msleep %>% 
	mutate(eats = recode(vore, "carni" = "meat", "omni" = "everything", "herbi" = "plants", "insecti" = "insects")) ->
msleep
```

## Save data
```{r}
saveRDS(msleep, file = "msleep_processed.rds")
```
